7 - Change for the Better

Date: July 6, 1904 Location: Nashville, TN Source: Letter 227, 1904 Status: Previously unpublished
Context: Mrs. White pens this letter at a critical time in the history of Oakwood. There is a transition in leadership and explicit instruction is given to the Oakwood board. In particular, E.B. Melendy, then business manager, is advised to cooperate with the new leadership.   
     To the members of the Huntsville School Board and Faculty, Dear Brethren,
